scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run preprocess
scripts.build-test: npm run setup && npm run preprocess-test
scripts.preprocess: postcss -u postcss-import -u autoprefixer -u postcss-reporter -o build/build.css index.css
scripts.preprocess-test: postcss -u postcss-import -u autoprefixer -u postcss-reporter -o build/test.css test/test.css
